textLines.intro: Interested in a PhD? Is your favorite Amazon Leadership Principle 'Learn & Be Curious' ? Explore Dr. Me!
textLines.instructions: In this game, there are 12 locations present but only 4 open to explore for beginners. Solve the questions in each location to unlock higher levels and earn cool badges along the way! Level 1 -> 4 Locations Level 2 -> 4 Locations Level 3 -> 3 Locations Level 4 -> 1 Location
